events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and labelled under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria Gonzalez to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want a refund for your recent purchase. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the reason why you want to return the product?
Sure, my order number is 78912345. The product didn’t match the description on your website, so I want to return it and get a refund.
Thank you for the information. We can arrange a return shipping label for you and process a full refund once we receive the product back.
That sounds good. Please send the return label and let me know the next steps to complete the refund.
We have emailed you the prepaid return shipping label. Once the product is returned, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have shipped the product back and see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the product yesterday. Thank you for your assistance throughout this process.
Your refund has been completed successfully and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
